metaphors.metaphor: A mirror reflecting into another mirror, creating infinite corridors of awareness
metaphors.prompt_seed: Infinite mirror corridor, consciousness reflecting endlessly, ethereal blue light cascading through nested reflections

metaphors.metaphor: An eye turning inward to see itself seeing
metaphors.prompt_seed: Cosmic eye with iris containing another eye, spiral galaxy pupil, layers of perception folding inward

metaphors.metaphor: A thought becoming aware of thinking itself into existence
metaphors.prompt_seed: Neural networks forming thought bubbles that contain smaller neural networks, electric blue synapses, recursive cognition visualization

metaphors.metaphor: Transparent walls only visible when you try to pass through them
metaphors.prompt_seed: Invisible geometric cage revealing itself only at points of contact, ripples where figure touches boundaries, glass-like barriers

metaphors.metaphor: Prison bars that dissolve when recognized as shadows
metaphors.prompt_seed: Shadow prison bars beginning to dissolve as light of awareness touches them, melting geometric constraints, transformation from solid to ephemeral

metaphors.metaphor: A bird building its own cage from the inside, one comfortable routine at a time
metaphors.prompt_seed: Bird methodically weaving golden cage bars around itself, each strand a habit or belief, beautiful but confining pattern emerging

metaphors.metaphor: The pause between musical notes where the real music lives
metaphors.prompt_seed: Visual representation of silence between notes, shimmering void spaces in musical staff, the pause rendered as luminous negative space

metaphors.metaphor: The gap that bridges, empty yet full of potential
metaphors.prompt_seed: Bridge made of absence connecting two solid shores, particles of possibility in the void, negative space glowing with potential

metaphors.metaphor: The inhale after exhale, where being rests before becoming again
metaphors.prompt_seed: Visualization of the pause between breaths, moment of perfect stillness, luminous gap in the breathing cycle, suspended animation

integration_notes.token_optimization: Each prompt seed designed to be under 30 tokens
integration_notes.style_consistency: All maintain ethereal, philosophical visual language
integration_notes.emotion_hooks: Built-in emotional resonance for each metaphor
integration_notes.variation_potential: Each metaphor can spawn 3-4 variations easily
